Description:
Detects binaries that use the same name as legitimate sysinternals tools to evade detection

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Binary Impersonating Sysinternals Tools
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (process_path="*\\accesschk.exe" OR process_path="*\\accesschk64.exe" OR process_path="*\\AccessEnum.exe" OR process_path="*\\ADExplorer.exe" OR process_path="*\\ADExplorer64.exe" OR process_path="*\\ADInsight.exe" OR process_path="*\\ADInsight64.exe" OR process_path="*\\adrestore.exe" OR process_path="*\\adrestore64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Autologon.exe" OR process_path="*\\Autologon64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Autoruns.exe" OR process_path="*\\Autoruns64.exe" OR process_path="*\\autorunsc.exe" OR process_path="*\\autorunsc64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Bginfo.exe" OR process_path="*\\Bginfo64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Cacheset.exe" OR process_path="*\\Cacheset64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Clockres.exe" OR process_path="*\\Clockres64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Contig.exe" OR process_path="*\\Contig64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Coreinfo.exe" OR process_path="*\\Coreinfo64.exe" OR process_path="*\\CPUSTRES.EXE" OR process_path="*\\CPUSTRES64.EXE" OR process_path="*\\ctrl2cap.exe" OR process_path="*\\Dbgview.exe" OR process_path="*\\dbgview64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Desktops.exe" OR process_path="*\\Desktops64.exe" OR process_path="*\\disk2vhd.exe" OR process_path="*\\disk2vhd64.exe" OR process_path="*\\diskext.exe" OR process_path="*\\diskext64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Diskmon.exe" OR process_path="*\\Diskmon64.exe" OR process_path="*\\DiskView.exe" OR process_path="*\\DiskView64.exe" OR process_path="*\\du.exe" OR process_path="*\\du64.exe" OR process_path="*\\efsdump.exe" OR process_path="*\\FindLinks.exe" OR process_path="*\\FindLinks64.exe" OR process_path="*\\handle.exe" OR process_path="*\\handle64.exe" OR process_path="*\\hex2dec.exe" OR process_path="*\\hex2dec64.exe" OR process_path="*\\junction.exe" OR process_path="*\\junction64.exe" OR process_path="*\\ldmdump.exe" OR process_path="*\\listdlls.exe" OR process_path="*\\listdlls64.exe" OR process_path="*\\livekd.exe" OR process_path="*\\livekd64.exe" OR process_path="*\\loadOrd.exe" OR process_path="*\\loadOrd64.exe" OR process_path="*\\loadOrdC.exe" OR process_path="*\\loadOrdC64.exe" OR process_path="*\\logonsessions.exe" OR process_path="*\\logonsessions64.exe" OR process_path="*\\movefile.exe" OR process_path="*\\movefile64.exe" OR process_path="*\\notmyfault.exe" OR process_path="*\\notmyfault64.exe" OR process_path="*\\notmyfaultc.exe" OR process_path="*\\notmyfaultc64.exe" OR process_path="*\\ntfsinfo.exe" OR process_path="*\\ntfsinfo64.exe" OR process_path="*\\pendmoves.exe" OR process_path="*\\pendmoves64.exe" OR process_path="*\\pipelist.exe" OR process_path="*\\pipelist64.exe" OR process_path="*\\portmon.exe" OR process_path="*\\procdump.exe" OR process_path="*\\procdump64.exe" OR process_path="*\\procexp.exe" OR process_path="*\\procexp64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Procmon.exe" OR process_path="*\\Procmon64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psExec.exe" OR process_path="*\\psExec64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psfile.exe" OR process_path="*\\psfile64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psGetsid.exe" OR process_path="*\\psGetsid64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psInfo.exe" OR process_path="*\\psInfo64.exe" OR process_path="*\\pskill.exe" OR process_path="*\\pskill64.exe" OR process_path="*\\pslist.exe" OR process_path="*\\pslist64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psLoggedon.exe" OR process_path="*\\psLoggedon64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psloglist.exe" OR process_path="*\\psloglist64.exe" OR process_path="*\\pspasswd.exe" OR process_path="*\\pspasswd64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psping.exe" OR process_path="*\\psping64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psService.exe" OR process_path="*\\psService64.exe" OR process_path="*\\psshutdown.exe" OR process_path="*\\psshutdown64.exe" OR process_path="*\\pssuspend.exe" OR process_path="*\\pssuspend64.exe" OR process_path="*\\RAMMap.exe" OR process_path="*\\RDCMan.exe" OR process_path="*\\RegDelNull.exe" OR process_path="*\\RegDelNull64.exe" OR process_path="*\\regjump.exe" OR process_path="*\\ru.exe" OR process_path="*\\ru64.exe" OR process_path="*\\sdelete.exe" OR process_path="*\\sdelete64.exe" OR process_path="*\\ShareEnum.exe" OR process_path="*\\ShareEnum64.exe" OR process_path="*\\shellRunas.exe" OR process_path="*\\sigcheck.exe" OR process_path="*\\sigcheck64.exe" OR process_path="*\\streams.exe" OR process_path="*\\streams64.exe" OR process_path="*\\strings.exe" OR process_path="*\\strings64.exe" OR process_path="*\\sync.exe" OR process_path="*\\sync64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Sysmon.exe" OR process_path="*\\Sysmon64.exe" OR process_path="*\\tcpvcon.exe" OR process_path="*\\tcpvcon64.exe" OR process_path="*\\tcpview.exe" OR process_path="*\\tcpview64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Testlimit.exe" OR process_path="*\\Testlimit64.exe" OR process_path="*\\vmmap.exe" OR process_path="*\\vmmap64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Volumeid.exe" OR process_path="*\\Volumeid64.exe" OR process_path="*\\whois.exe" OR process_path="*\\whois64.exe" OR process_path="*\\Winobj.exe" OR process_path="*\\Winobj64.exe" OR process_path="*\\ZoomIt.exe" OR process_path="*\\ZoomIt64.exe") NOT ((company="Sysinternals - www.sysinternals.com" OR company="Sysinternals") OR company="null")
